short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get historical price data for Amazon products

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Amazon PriceNinja is a tool that allows users to get the highest and lowest prices of a product on Amazon, as well as its price history. This plugin also provides detailed information about the product, such as its name, image, description, and customer reviews.

To use the plugin, users need to install it on their Chrome browser and then navigate to an Amazon product page. The plugin automatically collects the product information and displays it on the same page. Users can see the current price of the product, as well as its highest and lowest prices over time. The price history is presented in a graph, allowing users to easily see the price trends and identify the best time to buy.

In addition to price information, the plugin also displays other useful details about the product, such as its weight, dimensions, and features. Users can easily copy and paste this information into a spreadsheet or document for future reference.

Overall, Amazon PriceNinja is a useful tool for Amazon shoppers who want to make informed purchasing decisions. By providing price history and product information, the plugin allows users to identify the best deals and avoid overpaying for products.
